resources.string: At least one default font must be set
Heads up:\n\n We need permission to access your contacts and use your accessibility services so that we can do dope USSD magic for you.
You did not allow all permissions
Defaults accounts will show up first when you move money.

Hover’s Android SDK is a development kit meeting the criteria of 740.17(b)(3) (i) security classification of the United States Bureau of Industry and Security. This software uses HTTPS for server communication; symmetric key RSA encryption to temporarily store the user’s credentials on their own device using Android Keystore; and code obfuscation using DRM (Dexguard).
